description: Harmony Projects is a multifaceted initiative focused on sustainable hospitality and community engagement in Nosara, Costa Rica. Established in 2004, it encompasses hotels and restaurants, prioritizing local sourcing and environmental stewardship. With a commitment to regenerative practices, Harmony Projects aims to foster economic resilience by supporting local producers and enhancing community well-being. The organization emphasizes education, cultural preservation, and environmental conservation, striving to create a positive impact on both guests and the surrounding community.
name: Harmony Hotel
